name: Banksy with sound
description:
Use headphones for the best experience. Welcome!

Banksy gives you the opportunity to hear art you've only ever been able to see. Well, maybe you've heard them talk in your imagination.

Controls ControlActionLeft clickInspect and play audio
SpaceMove forward in scenes

Once you're in the game avoid spamming the space key. Instead, press play and explore the SFX in each of the available scenes. There are 3 - 5 sound effects in each scene that can be triggered by clicking on them. Take a moment and try imagining what they could mean at each point of the game.
